rules_text:
Foreshadow 4–{R}{G} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with four time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it’s an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
When Chaos Paragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature, planeswalker, or battle equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.
